com.dsi.ant.channel

Class Capabilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dsi.ant.channel.Capabilities

  • public final class Capabilities
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides possible capabilities of an ANT channel.

    See the ANT Message Protocol and Usage document for more details.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Capabilities

        public Capabilities()
        Constructs a Capabilities object with all capabilities default to false.

      • Capabilities

        public Capabilities(boolean rxMessageTimestamp,
            boolean extendedAssign,
            boolean backgroundScanning,
            boolean frequencyAgility)
        Constructs a Capabilities object with a default max output power level setting. Can be sent to the ANT chip to request use of the capabilities set to true in the constructor argument (only on capable ANT chips).
        Parameters:
        rxMessageTimestamp - true to enable rx timestamp, false otherwise.
        extendedAssign - true to enable extended assignment, false otherwise.
        backgroundScanning - true to enable background scanning, false otherwise.
        frequencyAgility - true to enable frequency agility, false otherwise.

      • hasCapabilities

        public boolean hasCapabilities(Capabilities desiredCapabilities)
        Checks for the desired capabilities.
        Parameters:
        desiredCapabilities - Has each capability to check for set.
        Returns:
        True if every capability set in the desired capabilities is also set in this capabilities instance. True if no desired capabilities provided.

      • numberOfCapabilities

        public int numberOfCapabilities(Capabilities desiredCapabilities)
        Checks for the number of desired capabilities.
        Parameters:
        desiredCapabilities - Has each capability to check for set.
        Returns:
        Number of capabilities set in the desired capabilities is also set in this capabilities instance. Zero if no desired capabilities provided.
